title: The Halden Effect
outcome: Unexplained disruptions begin in city districts once frequented by Halden. As BCI scoring in these areas cycles unpredictably, residents experience rare freedoms and spontaneous gatherings. Council factions scramble to control these destabilizing 'Halden Zones.'

events.description: Residents report power and BCI outages in districts linked to Halden's regular routes, with scoring rules fluctuating and some experiencing temporary service freedom.
Spontaneous gatherings form in affected neighborhoods, with art, speeches and collective action emerging, as BCI oversight weakens locally.
Council internal report confirms these 'Halden Zones' correspond to experimental BCI feedback circuits Halden installed before his death, now malfunctioning due to emergency system patches.
Word spreads: people are quietly moving into Halden Zones to escape normal BCI controls, challenging city authority and emboldening dissent.
Debate erupts within the Council over whether to restore order by force or soon propose selective amnesty to affected residents, deepening factional divides.
